text:
Hello !
I want to create a template custom .
In this template I have a section with custom module.
This is my code :
 `{# Ab Logos Section #}`
    `{% dnd_section` 
        `full_width=true,`
        `margin={`
          `'top': -375,`
          `'bottom': 0,`
          `'left': 0,`
          `'right': 0`
        `},`
          `padding={`
          `'top': 0,`
          `'bottom': 0,`
          `'left': 0,`
          `'right': 0`
        `}`
        
        `%}`
        `{% dnd_column`
         `padding={`
          `'top': 0,`
          `'bottom': 0,`
          `'left': 0,`
          `'right': 0`
        `},`
        `%}`
        `{% dnd_row %}`
            `{% dnd_module path='../modules/ab-logos.module',`
              `offset=0,`
              `width=12,`
              `content_alignment='center',`
              `headline = "Trusted by more of the top landscape businesses than any other",`
              `logos = [`
                
                  `{`
                  `"logo_image": {`
                      `"alt": "Sposato landscape-Include Software",`
                      `"height": 200,`
                      `"max_height": 200,`
                      `"max_width": 310,`
                      `"size_type": "auto",`
                      `"src": "<https://www.include.com/hubfs/NewIncludeSoftwareWebsite/Home/Hittle%20Landscaping-Include%20Software.jpg>",`
                      `"width": 310`
                    `},`
                  `"logo_title": "",`
                 `},`
                 
                 `{`
                  `"logo_image": {`
                      `"alt": "Sposato landscape-Include Software",`
                      `"height": 200,`
                      `"max_height": 200,`
                      `"max_width": 310,`
                      `"size_type": "auto",`
                      `"src": "<https://www.include.com/hubfs/NewIncludeSoftwareWebsite/Home/Providing%20Green%20Peace%20of%20Mind-Include%20Software.jpg>",`
                      `"width": 310`
                    `},`
                  `"logo_title": "",`
                 `},`
                 
                 `{`
                  `"logo_image": {`
                      `"alt": "Sposato landscape-Include Software",`
                      `"height": 200,`
                      `"max_height": 200,`
                      `"max_width": 310,`
                      `"size_type": "auto",`
                      `"src": "<https://www.include.com/hubfs/NewIncludeSoftwareWebsite/Home/Crystal%20Greens-Include%20Software.jpg>",`
                      `"width": 310`
                    `},`
                  `"logo_title": "",`
                 `},`
                 
                 `{`
                  `"logo_image": {`
                      `"alt": "Sposato landscape-Include Software",`
                      `"height": 200,`
                      `"max_height": 200,`
                      `"max_width": 310,`
                      `"size_type": "auto",`
                      `"src": "<https://www.include.com/hubfs/NewIncludeSoftwareWebsite/Home/Complete%20Landsculpture-Include%20Software.jpg>",`
                      `"width": 310`
                    `},`
                  `"logo_title": "",`
                 `},`
                 
                 `{`
                  `"logo_image": {`
                      `"alt": "Sposato landscape-Include Software",`
                      `"height": 200,`
                      `"max_height": 200,`
                      `"max_width": 310,`
                      `"size_type": "auto",`
                      `"src": "<https://www.include.com/hubfs/NewIncludeSoftwareWebsite/Home/Drost%20landscape-Include%20Software.jpg>",`
                      `"width": 310`
                    `},`
                  `"logo_title": "",`
                 `}`
           
             
            `]`
        
            `%}`
            `{% end_dnd_module %}`
        `{% end_dnd_row %}`
        `{% end_dnd_column %}`
    `{% end_dnd_section %}`
    `{# End Ab Logos Section #}`

I received this error : *Invalid argument in 'dnd_module': dnd_area-module-9 spanning columns 1 to 12 overlaps with dnd_area-module-8 spanning columns 1 to 12* 

I don't understand why and which is the problem .
Can someone help me?

<#C2YH119N2|hubl> <#CDU990ECW|drag-n-drop-pages> Hi guys, wondering what will be the alternative for custom hubl to generate a drop & drop feature to make {% dnd_area "body_dnd_area" %} {% end_dnd_area %} works in  Drag n drop. Custom HUBL seems to be depreciated and I want to add Drag & Drop in the our landing pages template. Does the only option is to create a .HTML file? Thank you so much for responding!

Hi all, I’ve searched around but can’t seem to find what I’d like. When a user submits the subscribe to blog form and then revisits the page or another page with the form on it, it still appears (pre-populated). Is there HUBL code to hide the form if the current user email has subscribed?
